review:
I went for a second opinion about my dad’s leg surgery. He is a well versed doctor, keeping patience and endurance with patient’s concern and queries. 
He thoroughly explains the exercises and the cause of ailment, comforting the patient on the go.

*** ***** ****** ** *** **** ********** ******* ** ***** *** * ** ******* **** ***** ** **** ************ **** ***** **** ********** ******** My Mother was suffering from both knee pain from last 20 years and she even could not walk as her leg was bend by 30 degree. On 2016 my mother was operated by Dr. Simon Thomas. Now she can walk 500 mtrs easily and climb stair till 3rd floor. Dr. Simon is very nice and co-operative with all patient and family. 
Great doctor

I visited Dr Simon for pain in wrist. He explained me the reason behind the paid extremely well and also make me understand the course of treatment need to be done.

He hear me out properly and cleared my all doubts
Consulted him for back pain problem, got really satisfactory answers to my questions. What I really liked that he did not ask me to for any unnecessary tests which really saved time and money.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I never met doctor like him who is so dwn to earth n understand his patients prblm. ** *********** ******

Met Dr Simon for pain in legs and and feet. Docter is very friendly and approachable. He in depth explained the problem and treatment. Gave more emphasis on excersises and avoided unnecessary tests. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
